entries.name: Hydrazine/Hypergolics
entries.description: Toxic, shelf-stable monopropellants. Standard for RCS and legacy maneuvering.

entries.name: Methalox (CH4/LOX)
entries.description: Liquid Methane/Oxygen. High-performance standard for surface-to-orbit rocketry.

entries.name: Liquid Hydrogen (LH2)
entries.description: Pure cryogenic hydrogen. Used as reaction mass for NTR and some Fusion drives.

entries.name: Water (Remass)
entries.description: Dense, abundant reaction mass for high-efficiency fusion torches.

entries.name: Xenon Gas
entries.description: Noble gas for Gridded Ion and Hall Effect thrusters.

entries.name: Liquid Argon
entries.description: Inexpensive noble gas for electric propulsion.

entries.name: Enriched Uranium
entries.description: Dense fissile material for reactor cores and solid-core rockets.

entries.name: Nuclear Pulse Units
entries.description: Shaped nuclear charges for Orion-style pulse propulsion.

entries.name: Deuterium-Tritium Ice
entries.description: Cryogenic fusion fuel. High energy density.

entries.name: Helium-3
entries.description: Rare isotope for clean aneutronic fusion.

entries.name: Metallic Hydrogen
entries.description: Metastable hydrogen with incredible energy density.

entries.name: Exotic Matter
entries.description: Matter with negative energy density, required to stabilize warp bubbles.
